overview: Fly directly into the heart of Wisconsin's mammoth EAA AirVenture Oshkosh air show to get an up-close and personal look at an enormous variety of aircraft, including military fighters, civilian passenger planes and more. This documentary also explains in kid-friendly terms how airplanes fly and maneuver, includes interviews with daredevil wingwalkers and shows a supersonic Concorde taking off and landing.
title: The Big Airshow
